abstract: Letters from Director Paul N Samuels of the Legal Action Center, Dr Robert L DuPont, founding director of the National Institute on Drug Abuse and Susan E Foster, director at the National Center on Addiction and Substance Abuse at Columbia University, comment on Oct 11 front page article about states adding drug tests to list of requirements for welfare eligibility.
snippet: Readers respond to an article about states adding drug tests as a hurdle for welfare.
lead_paragraph: Readers respond to an article about states adding drug tests as a hurdle for welfare.

headline.main: Testing State Aid Recipients for Drugs
